channel.title: Freight Elevator ~ Crouching Bug
channel.description:
When you crouch on the massive freight elevator, it stops, then stutters, then carries on moving. Not a huuuge bug, but it does break immersion.
[b]Note:[/b] I only noticed this when crouching in one of the corners. It could be that the rest of the elevator is fine and that I may have been getting "stuck" on a bit of wall, but I don't think I was that close.

item.title: Freight Elevator ~ Crouching Bug
item.dc:creator: SpiritSharD
item.description:
When you crouch on the massive freight elevator, it stops, then stutters, then carries on moving. Not a huuuge bug, but it does break immersion.

Note: I only noticed this when crouching in one of the corners. It could be that the rest of the elevator is fine and that I may have been getting “stuck” on a bit of wall, but I don’t think I was that close.
